results.description: Uses actual vs consensus EPS to capture earnings surprise momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using actual_eps_value_quarterly and est_eps; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector field). Coverage >0.6 so SUGGESTION3 not needed. Chose high userCount fields per SUGGESTION4. Kept implementation short per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.80.

Long stocks with large positive EPS surprise that subsequently mean-revert. Used actual_eps_value_quarterly and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). No vector fields (SUGGESTION2 N/A). Coverage high so no ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Simple operators to respect KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.65.

Capture momentum in analyst estimate revisions using short-term delta of est_eps. Used est_eps only (SUGGESTION1 minimal). No vector fields. Coverage ~0.78 so no backfill. Implementation compact. Confidence: 0.72.

Detect accelerating upgrades by comparing recent increase in earnings_per_share_estimate_count to historical. Used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). Counts high userCount so follow SUGGESTION4. No vector. Confidence: 0.70.

Short stocks with high stddev of EPS estimates indicating uncertainty. Uses anl4_afv4_dts_spe (EPS std) and anl4_qfv4_eps_number to normalize. Applied SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4. Coverage >0.6 so no backfill. Confidence: 0.58.
Capture quarter EBITDA surprise using anl4_ebitda_value vs anl4_ebitda_mean. SUGGESTION1 used two fields. High userCount for ebitda_value per SUGGESTION4. No vector. Confidence: 0.75.

Measures Cash Flow from Operations surprise: anl4_cfo_value - anl4_cfo_mean. SUGGESTION1 used both. Coverage ~0.58 but userCount high; since coverage slightly <0.6, applied ts_backfill to be safe per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.68.
Stocks with recent sales beating est_sales and accelerating. Uses actual_sales_value_quarterly and est_sales (SUGGESTION1). Coverage high so no backfill. Kept operators minimal. Confidence: 0.74.
Compare short-term est_eps delta to long-term trend (momentum vs trend). Used est_eps only (SUGGESTION1). No vector. Coverage ok. Keeps operators under limit. Confidence: 0.66.
Stocks gaining number of forecasts (anl4_qfv4_eps_number) which often precedes re-rating. SUGGESTION1 used one datafield (count). No vector. Coverage high; no backfill. Confidence: 0.60.

Long stocks with positive EPS surprise and low estimation dispersion: actual_eps - est_eps adjusted by earnings_per_share_standard_deviation. Used two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence: 0.78.

Detect firms issuing higher max_ebit_guidance relative to previous guidance. Uses max_ebit_guidance and anl4_dez1qfv4_est (previous estimate). SUGGESTION3 not needed (coverage 1.0). SUGGESTION4 applied by selecting high-coverage guidance field. Confidence: 0.70.

results.idea: Free cash flow per share upgrade
results.description: Capture upgrades in est_fcf_ps by ts_delta vs long-term mean. SUGGESTION1 used est_fcf_ps and anl4_fcf_mean optional but kept single field to be concise. Coverage moderate so applied ts_backfill (SUGGESTION3). Confidence: 0.62.
Compare est_netprofit growth to est_tot_assets to spot margin expansion. Uses est_netprofit and est_tot_assets per SUGGESTION1. Coverage okay; no backfill. Confidence: 0.59.
Rank stocks by recent est_eps revisions cross-sectionally. Applied SUGGESTION1 with est_eps. No vector. Used quantile to normalize per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.64.
Use anl4_buy (number of buy recs) increase to find improving sentiment. SUGGESTION1 used anl4_buy and normalizer anl4_total_rec (kept 2 fields). Coverage decent; no backfill. Confidence: 0.61.
Rising brokerage coverage (anl4_basicconqfv110_numest) can foreshadow flows. Used that and est_eps to couple coverage with fundamentals (SUGGESTION1). Coverage ~0.7 so no backfill. Confidence: 0.56.

EBITDA momentum neutralized by industry to remove sector bias. Used anl4_ebitda_value and industry group via group_neutralize (SUGGESTION1 + KEEP_IN_MIND4: group used in group_neutralize). Coverage high; no backfill. Confidence: 0.69.
Detect sudden drops in capex vs est_capex that could free cash flow. Used anl4_capex_value and est_capex (SUGGESTION1). Coverage ~0.66 so no backfill. Confidence: 0.60.
Falling stddev of estimates often precedes consensus. Used anl4_ebit_std and anl4_afv4_eps_number to normalize (SUGGESTION1). Coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: High-quality surprise: EPS surprise scaled by book value
results.description: Scale EPS surprise by est_bookvalue_ps to find fundamental improvement. Uses actual_eps_value_quarterly and est_bookvalue_ps (SUGGESTION1). est_bookvalue_ps coverage ~0.67; no backfill. Confidence: 0.67.
Use information ratio of EPS surprise over past window to find durable surprises. Uses actual_eps_value_quarterly and est_eps (SUGGESTION1). Kept operators minimal. Confidence: 0.73.
Measure recent revisions in sales estimates (ts_delta) to capture improving trends. Uses est_sales only per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ok. Confidence: 0.61.

High anl4_mark (recommendation consensus) combined with positive EPS surprise indicates strong conviction. Uses anl4_mark and subtract(actual_eps_value_quarterly, est_eps). SUGGESTION4 used high userCount anl4_mark. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Short if high estimate dispersion but falling actuals
results.description: Short stocks where earnings_per_share_standard_deviation is high and actual_eps trending down. Used earnings_per_share_standard_deviation and ts_delta(actual_eps_value_quarterly). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum in announced financials (announced vs median estimate)
results.description: Compare anl4_cfo_value (announced) vs anl4_cfo_mean (median) to find momentum in realized cash flows. SUGGESTION1 used both. Coverage ~0.58 so used ts_backfill for robustness per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.65.
Rising total_goodwill_amount vs est_tot_goodwill may indicate risk. Used total_goodwill_amount and est_tot_goodwill (SUGGESTION1). Coverage moderate; applied ts_backfill if needed. Confidence: 0.50.
Bucket stocks by 90-day est_eps change and long top bucket. Used est_eps and bucket to create groups (SUGGESTION1, KEEP_IN_MIND2). No vector. Confidence: 0.63.
Favor stocks with positive EPS surprise and low ts_kurtosis of est_eps (stable upside). Uses actual_eps_value_quarterly and ts_kurtosis(est_eps,63). Applied SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.60.

Positive revisions in net_debt_actual_value (decline in net debt) signal improving balance sheet. Uses net_debt_actual_value and est_netdebt (SUGGESTION1). Coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: High forecast count and positive surprise
results.description: Combine earnings_per_share_estimate_count growth with EPS surprise for conviction. Used earnings_per_share_estimate_count and subtract(actual_eps_value_quarterly, est_eps) per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.67.

results.idea: Cashflow surprise scaled by shares outstanding
results.description: Scale anl4_cfo_value surprise by shares_outstanding to get per-share impact. Uses anl4_cfo_value and shares_outstanding_max_guidance (SUGGESTION1). Kept ops simple. Confidence: 0.55.
Use anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue changes to capture rating momentum. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ~0.71 so no backfill. Confidence: 0.60.
Long if est_eps shows consistent upward ts_rank over 1 year. Used ts_rank(est_eps, 252) per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: High buy recommendations relative to total
results.description: Long stocks with high anl4_buy / anl4_total_rec ratio that is rising. Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ok. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Unexpected decline in capex vs est
results.description: Identify firms cutting capex unexpectedly: subtract(anl4_capex_value, anl4_median_capexp). SUGGESTION1 used two fields; coverage OK. Confidence: 0.56.
Long stocks where est_eps is high and anl4_afv4_dts_spe is low. Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. Applied quantile to normalize. Confidence: 0.71.

results.idea: Short on falling announced sales vs consensus
results.description: Short firms where actual_sales_value_quarterly < sales_estimate_median_value. Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage high; no backfill. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Increase in number of lower ests (bearish signal)
results.description: Use anl4_ady_down increases as a negative signal for fundamentals. Single datafield per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ~0.72. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Earnings quality: adjusted net income surprise
results.description: Use net_profit_adjusted_value vs net_profit_adjusted_min_guidance to detect quality surprises. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum in funds from operations est (est_ffo)
results.description: Capture positive changes in est_ffo relative to long-term mean. Uses est_ffo only (SUGGESTION1). Coverage low (0.0411) so applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.45.

results.idea: High recommendation consensus with increasing buy count
results.description: Combine anl4_mark and ts_delta(anl4_buy) to find sentiment shifts. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. High userCounts used per SUGGESTION4. Confidence: 0.62.
Measure anl4_cfo_value growth relative to est_sales to capture margin improvement. Uses anl4_cfo_value and est_sales (SUGGESTION1). Coverage ok. Confidence: 0.60.
Falling earnings_per_share_standard_deviation combined with rising est_eps is constructive. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage adequate. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Short unexpected dividend cuts vs dividend_estimate_median_quarterly
results.description: Compare actual_dividend_value_quarterly to dividend_estimate_median_quarterly; surprise negative -> short. Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: High EBITDA estimate upgrades relative to assets
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_ebitda_mean,90) scaled by total_assets_amount to find operational leverage. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.61.
For lower coverage field anl4_cfi_value, apply ts_backfill then momentum. Applied SUGGESTION3; used single field to keep operators low per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.50.
Use max_share_buyback_guidance increases to detect capital return policies. Single high-coverage field (SUGGESTION1). Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: Improving operating profit before depr & amort
results.description: Use operating_profit_before_depr_amort changes vs guidance to detect improvements. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence: 0.64.

results.idea: Rising analyst consensus while EPS still below estimates (re-rating)
results.description: Combine est_eps rising (ts_delta) with current negative EPS surprise to find potential re-rating stocks. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.57.
Positive sales surprise divided by sales_estimate_standard_deviation to find reliable beats. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ~0.68 so no backfill. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Momentum of pretax income vs estimates
results.description: Compare pretax_income_reported_value with anl4_ptp_value (est) to capture profit surprises. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage high so no backfill. Confidence: 0.63.

results.idea: Rising broker count with positive announced financials
results.description: Multiply ts_delta(anl4_basicconqfv110_numest) with ts_zscore(anl4_afv4_actual) to capture growing coverage with realized beat. Uses two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.60.

results.idea: Short on increasing net debt estimates
results.description: ts_delta(est_netdebt,90) positive -> worsening balance sheet, short. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ~0.54 so used ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.52.

announced fcf (anl4_fcf_value) exceeding est_fcf points to cash conversion. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence: 0.62.
ts_std_dev(est_eps,21) spike indicates sudden analyst disagreement; short. Uses est_eps (SUGGESTION1) and ts_std_dev. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: High-quality sales beat with rising est_sales
results.description: Positive actual_sales beat and rising est_sales indicates sustainable growth. Uses actual_sales_value_quarterly and est_sales. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.69.

results.idea: Stable low SGA relative to peers
results.description: Compare selling_general_admin_expense_reported_value to est_sga median; two fields used. Keep operations minimal. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Rising adjusted funds from operations surprise
results.description: Compare est_ffo (even if low coverage) using ts_backfill then ts_zscore to detect improvements. Applied SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.48.

Compare guidance_estimate_value to previous_guidance_estimate (both guidance fields). Since previous_guidance_estimate coverage 0, avoid using it; used guidance_estimate_value alone as delta. Applied SUGGESTIONS accordingly. Confidence: 0.50.

results.idea: Short when number of underweight recommendations rises
results.description: Use anl4_under increases as contrarian negative signal. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ~0.62. Confidence: 0.54.
Scale EPS surprise by book value per share (anl4_bvps_value) to find per-share improvement. Two fields used. Coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.57.
ts_delta(anl4_afv4_median_eps,90) negative -> short. Uses anl4_afv4_median_eps with high coverage. Confidence: 0.59.

results.description: Combine anl4_ebitda_value beat vs anl4_ebitda_mean trend. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.68.

results.idea: High present value of free cash flow per share surprise
results.description: actual free_cash_flow_per_share vs est_fcf_ps to find conversion. Two fields used. Coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence: 0.60.

results.idea: Momentum in recommended buys normalized by group
results.description: Use group_neutralize on anl4_buy to remove sector bias (KEEP_IN_MIND4 used properly). Two inputs: anl4_buy and group. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Short when announced financing cashflow spikes negative
results.description: Large negative financing cash flows (cashflow_from_financing) can signal distress. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ~0.64. Confidence: 0.53.
Increase in number of positive EPS beats using earnings_per_share_estimate_count trend with actuals. Used two fields as per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.66.
Compare operating_cashflow_reported_value vs anl4_cfo_mean to detect operational cash improvements. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Positive trend in tangible book value per share
results.description: Rising anl4_tbvps_mean signals balance sheet strength. Single field used for simplicity per SUGGESTION1. Coverage low (~0.33) so applied ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.49.

results.idea: High recommendation consensus and low estimate std
results.description: Combine anl4_mark (consensus score) with low anl4_ebit_std to find stable conviction. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.63.
Use quantile of ts_delta(est_sales,90) to rank acceleration across stocks. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.62.
Large drop in dividend_estimate_value indicates payout risk. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Coverage ~0.47 so used ts_backfill. Confidence: 0.50.

results.idea: High announced gross income vs est_grossincome
results.description: Compare gross_income_reported_value with est_grossincome. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage good. Confidence: 0.65.
Falling anl4_gric_std (gross income std) while est_gric_mean rises indicates agreement on improvement. Two fields used per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.58.
If anl4_ebitda_value > anl4_ebitda_high, extreme positive surprise. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.70.

results.idea: Rising tangible book value vs guidance
results.description: Compare book_value_per_share_reported_value vs book_value_per_share_min_guidance to spot upward surprise. Two fields used. Coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.54.

results.idea: Short if number of lower estimations accumulates
results.description: Use anl4_basicconafv110_down trend as negative signal. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.51.

results.description: Use ts_rank over 4 quarters for est_sales to find consistent upgrades. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.60.

results.description: Use est_epsa (adjusted EPS estimates) to measure surprise quality: subtract(actual_eps_value_quarterly, est_epsa). SUGGESTION1 used adjusted field. Coverage low (0.1579) so applied ts_backfill per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.53.

results.idea: Rapid increase in forecast disagreement then reversal
results.description: Spike in earnings_per_share_standard_deviation followed by falling est_eps may signal sharp reversals. Two fields used. Confidence: 0.48.

Compare free_cash_flow_total vs est_fcf to find firms converting earnings into cash. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage moderate. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Persistent tip-toe in estimates (small steady upgrades)
results.description: Small positive ts_mean(ts_delta(est_eps,30),180) indicates gradual upgrades. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.55.

results.idea: High announced net profit vs est_netprofit
results.description: net_profit_reported_value minus est_netprofit signals realized profit beats. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage good. Confidence: 0.66.

results.idea: Rising consensus while EBIT margin improves
results.description: Combine ts_delta(anl4_ebit_mean) with ts_delta(est_sales) to find margin expansion. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.58.
Growth in anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue signals improving analyst sentiment. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Tolerance for low-coverage fields via backfill

Rising anl4_cff_mean (cash flow from financing mean) negative -> buy if declining outflows. Use sign to orient. Two fields avoided to keep simple. Confidence: 0.50.

results.idea: High-quality EPS growth vs shares outstanding
results.description: Scale est_eps growth by min_basic_shares_guidance to adjust for dilution. Uses est_eps and min_basic_shares_guidance (SUGGESTION1). Confidence: 0.55.
Compare net_profit_adjusted_value to net_profit_adjusted_min_guidance to find positive surprises. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.61.

results.description: ts_delta(anl4_basicconqfv110_pu) captures shift to more optimistic forecasts. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.57.

results.description: Divide CFO surprise by total_assets_amount to find asset-light cash improvements. Uses anl4_cfo_value and total_assets_amount per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.60.

Rising dividend_min_guidance_quarterly relative to previous indicates payout upgrades. Use single guidance field. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Short on increasing net debt actual value vs est_netdebt
results.description: If net_debt_actual_value rises faster than est_netdebt, short. Two fields used, applied ts_backfill if coverage low per SUGGESTION3. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Rapid improvement in reported pretax income
results.description: pretax_income_reported_value beats anl4_ptp_value -> positive signal. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.64.
ts_zscore(winsorize(ts_delta(est_eps,90))) to reduce outliers and capture momentum. Single field plus winsorize. SUGGESTION1 minimal. Confidence: 0.63.
Normalize ts_delta(anl4_basicdetailrec_ratingvalue) cross-sectionally via quantile to find relative leaders. Single field used. Confidence: 0.58.
Combine EPS surprise and sales surprise multiplicatively to find broad beats. Uses actual_eps_value_quarterly and actual_sales_value_quarterly per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.72.

results.idea: Rising estimated total assets with improving returns
results.description: Combine ts_delta(est_tot_assets) and ts_delta(est_netprofit) to identify return on asset improvement. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Announced financials beat consensus multiple quarters
results.description: Sum recent quarterly EPS surprises via ts_sum for durability. Uses subtract(actual_eps_value_quarterly, est_eps) in ts_sum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence: 0.70.

Compare free_cash_flow_per_share to cashflow_per_share_average to find conversion. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence: 0.61.
Sharp decline in anl4_cff_mean indicates financing stress. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.52.

results.idea: Rising gross income surprises with low std
results.description: Large gross_income_reported_value beat divided by anl4_gric_std to ensure reliability. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.67.

results.description: Apply winsorize to ts_delta(est_eps,90) then quantile to get cross-sectional ranks and reduce outliers. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.62.

results.description: Use ffo guidance changes (max_adjusted_funds_from_operations_guidance) to detect operational improvements. Single high-coverage guidance field. Confidence: 0.54.

results.description: ts_delta(est_fcf,90) negative indicates cash conversion impairment. Single field per SUGGESTION1. Coverage moderate; no backfill. Confidence: 0.51.

results.description: Combine ts_delta(est_bookvalue_ps) and EPS surprise for quality growth. Two fields per SUGGESTION1. Confidence: 0.60.
